general.text: To start, can you tell me a little about yourself?
What motivated you to apply for this role?
Can you describe a challenge you faced and how you handled it?
Tell me about a project or experience you are proud of.
Is there anything else you would like us to know about you?

behavioral.text: Tell me about a time you had a conflict with a coworker.
What is your greatest strength and your greatest weakness?
Describe a situation where you had to meet a tight deadline.
How do you handle constructive criticism?
Where do you see yourself in five years?

technical.text: Explain the concept of Big O notation to a beginner.
What is the difference between a process and a thread?
How does DNS resolution work when you type a URL?
Describe the difference between TCP and UDP.

shopify-ml-intern.text: Tell me about your experience with machine learning frameworks like PyTorch or TensorFlow.
Shopify deals with massive scale. How would you design a recommendation system for millions of products?
Explain the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning.
Describe a time you cleaned a messy dataset. What was the outcome?
Why do you want to work specifically on ML infrastructure at Shopify?

nokia-infra.text: What does 'Infrastructure as Code' mean to you?
Explain the role of Docker and Kubernetes in modern deployments.
How would you troubleshoot a server that is becoming unresponsive?
Tell me about a time you automated a manual process to save time.
Why is Nokia's network infrastructure appealing to you?

full-stack.text: What is the Virtual DOM in React and why is it faster?
Explain the difference between SQL and NoSQL databases.
How do you handle state management in large complete applications?
Design a simple API for a To-Do list application.

test-software-engineer.text: Explain the CAP theorem and what it means for a distributed system.
In your own words, can you explain the core concept of Object-Oriented Programming?
